# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="42096-102">Tlač e-mailov, kalendárov a príloh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="42096-103">Tlač e-mailovej správy v Outlooku na webe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-103">To print an email message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="42096-104">Vyberte správu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="42096-105">V pravom hornom rohu správy vyberte tri bodky a potom vyberte položku **Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="42096-106">Tlač kalendára:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="42096-107">V pravom hornom rohu stránky vyberte položku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="42096-108">**Tlač**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="42096-109">Vyberte zobrazenie a časový rozsah a vyberte položku **Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="42096-110">Tlač prílohy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="42096-111">Otvorte správu obsahujúcu prílohu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="42096-112">Presuňte kurzor na prílohu a vyberte ikonu **sťahovania**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="42096-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-113">.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="42096-114">Po stiahnutí súboru ho otvorte s príslušným programom a vyberte možnosť, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="42096-115">Otvorte napríklad súbor. doc vo Worde a potom ho vytlačte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="42096-116">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v téme [tlač e-mailových správ, príloh a kalendárov v Outlooku na webe](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42096-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
